channel.title: GitHub Trending - Ruby (Monthly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Ruby nel periodo monthly

item.title: 📝 l5yth/potato-mesh (80 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: l5yth

📝 Repository: l5yth/potato-mesh

📄 Descrizione: A simple Meshtastic-powered node dashboard for your local community. No MQTT clutter, just local LoRa aether.

⭐ Stelle: 80

🍴 Forks: 5

💻 Linguaggio: Ruby

🏷️ Topics: dashboard meshtastic qos webapp

📜 Licenza: Apache License 2.0

⏰ Creato il: 2025-09-13T06:09:07Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-10-02T17:57:26Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>

item.title: 📝 derails/derails (59 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: derails

📝 Repository: derails/derails

📄 Descrizione: Revolutionary Rails fork by Supreme Leader Kim Jong Rails. PostgreSQL-only, AWS-free, adapters sold separately. Contributions disabled. Innovation over pronouns. Train speed: 60km/h 🚂

⭐ Stelle: 59

🍴 Forks: 4

💻 Linguaggio: Ruby

🏷️ Topics: 60kmh adapter-tax anti-woke bitcoin-required lazywork no-aws oracle-doctrine postgresql-only rails-fork revolutionary-framework

📜 Licenza: Other

⏰ Creato il: 2025-09-25T08:26:38Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-10-02T16:31:23Z

Visita il Repository su GitHub

]]>
